titles: A true relation of the grievous handling of William Sommers of Nottingham being possessed with a devill shewing how he was first taken and how lamentable from time to time he was tormented and afflicted / published by John Darrel ...
author: Darrel, John, b. ca. 1562.
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
keywords: Demoniac possession --  England --  Early works to 1800.
